item.title: Mark Zuckerberg Just Made a Massive Bet on Nuclear-Powered AI
item.description: Meta announced agreements with three nuclear companies to help power an AI supercluster.

item.description: Sometimes just reminding yourself of the temporality of failure enables you to forge ahead.

item.description: The judge agreed to an unusual exception.
